sen.j: 京都向日町競輪場（きょうとむこうまちけいりんじょう）は、京都府向日市にある競輪場。
sen.e: Kyoto Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome is a keirin velodrome located in Mukomachi City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome is a keirin velodrome located in Mukomachi City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome is a keirin velodrome located in Mukomachi City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 施設所有および主な主催は京都府。
sen.e: The owner of the facilities and main sponsor of the races is Kyoto Prefecture.
The owner of the facilities and main sponsor of the races is Kyoto Prefecture.
The owner of the facilities and main sponsor of the races is Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 実施は日本自転車競技会近畿支部。
sen.e: The operator is Nihon Zitensya Kyogikai (Japan Cycling Association) Kinki Branch.
The operator is Nihon Zitensya Kyogikai (Japan Cycling Association) Kinki Branch.
The operator is Nihon Zitensha Kyogikai (Japan Cycling Association) Kinki Branch.

sen.j: 電話投票における競輪場コードは54。
sen.e: Its Keirin Velodrome Code for telephone purchases of betting tickets is 54.
Its Keirin Velodrome Code for telephone purchases of betting tickets is 54.
Its Keirin Velodrome Code for telephone purchases of betting tickets is 54.

sen.j: 実況は滝口久が担当。
sen.e: The commentator is Hisashi TAKIGUCHI.
The commentator is Hisashi TAKIGUCHI.
The commentator is Hisashi TAKIGUCHI.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 1950年に開設された時は自治体名が「向日町」であったことから向日町競輪場という名称となった。
sen.e: When the velodrome opened in 1950, it was named Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome after its municipality, 'Mukomachi.'
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: When the velodrome opened in 1950, it was named Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome after the municipality, 'Mukomachi.'
When the velodrome opened in 1950, it was named Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome after the municipality, 'Mukomachi.'

sen.j: 1972年10月1日の市制施行後もその名称は変わらず、1986年9月から現在の名称になった。
sen.e: Its name remained the same even after the town became a city on October 1, 1972, but later in September 1986, it was changed to the current name.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Its name remained the same even after the town became a city on October 1, 1972, but later in September 1986, it was changed to the current name.
Its name remained the same even after the town became a city on October 1, 1972, but later in September 1986, it was changed to the current name.

sen.j: 記念競輪 (競輪の競走格付けGIII (G3)) として｢平安賞｣が行われているが、1965年9月の15周年後節は台風のため打ち切りとなってしまった。
sen.e: The Heian Prize takes place at this velodrome as a memorial bicycle race, (ranked as a Grade 3 (G3) Race in the Keirin race rating) but the race of the second term in September, 1965, which was the 15th year anniversary, was canceled due to a typhoon.

The Heian Prize takes place at this velodrome as a memorial bicycle race, (ranked as a Grade 3 (G3) Race in the Keirin race rating) but the race for the second term in September, 1965, which was the 15th year anniversary, was canceled due to a typhoon.

The Heian Prize' takes place at this velodrome as a memorial bicycle race, (ranked as a Grade 3 (G3) race in the Keirin race rating) but the race for the second term in September, 1965, which was the 15th year anniversary, was canceled due to a typhoon.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを補足しました。

sen.j: 競輪の競走格付けGI (G1) は1987年に読売新聞社杯全日本選抜競輪、競輪の競走格付けGII (G2) は2003年にふるさとダービーが、2007年には共同通信社杯競輪が行われた。
sen.e: Out of Grade 1 (G1) races in the Keirin race rating, Yomiurinews Cup All Japan Selection Keirin was held in 1987 and out of Grade 2 (G2) races in the Keirin race rating, Furusato Derby in 2003, as well as Kyodo Cup Keirin in 2007 took place.

Out of the Grade 1 (G1) races in the Keirin race rating, the Yomiuri News Cup All Japan Selection Keirin was held in 1987 and out of the Grade 2 (G2) races in the Keirin race rating, the Furusato Derby in 2003, as well as the Kyodo Cup Keirin in 2007, took place.

Out of the Grade 1 (G1) races in the Keirin race rating, the Yomiuri News Cup All Japan Selection Keirin was held in 1987 and out of the Grade 2 (G2) races in the Keirin race rating, the Furusato Derby in 2003, as well as the Kyodo News Service Cup Keirin in 2007, took place.

sen.j: 現役時代は前人未到の1341勝を挙げ、京都向日町競輪場をホームバンクとしていた松本勝明を称え松本勝明賞が開催されている。
sen.e: The Katsuaki MATSUMOTO Prize commemorating Katsuaki MATSUMOTO, who won unprecedented 1341 races and whose home was the Kyoto Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome, takes place here.
The Katsuaki MATSUMOTO Prize commemorating Katsuaki MATSUMOTO, who won the unprecedented 1341 races and whose home was at the Kyoto Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome, takes place here.
The Katsuaki MATSUMOTO Prize commemorating Katsuaki MATSUMOTO, who won the unprecedented 1341 races and whose home track was at the Kyoto Mukomachi Keirin Velodrome, takes place here.

sen.j: イメージキャラクターは「ムコリンムッチー」であり、それにちなんで「ムコリンムッチー賞」が開催されている。
sen.e: As its mascot is 'Mukorin Mucchi,' a race named after the character called 'Mukorin Mucchi Prize' is also held.
As its mascot is 'Mukorin Mucchi,' a race named after the character, called the 'Mukorin Mucchi Prize,' is also held.
As its mascot is 'Mukorin Mucchi,' a race named after the character, called the 'Mukorin Mucchi Prize,' is also held.

sen.j: 大部分の施設は昭和40年代に建設されすでに老朽化していた。
sen.e: Most of the velodrome facilities were constructed in the late 1950's to the early 1960's and had become too old.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Most of the velodrome facilities were constructed between the late 1950's and the early 1960's and had become too old.
Most of the velodrome facilities were constructed between the late 1950's and the early 1960's and had become too old.

sen.j: 収益も好転することが予期できないため事業存廃について検討するように求められていた。
sen.e: Also, as there was little prospect for the business to recover, it was required to be put under review if it should continue.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Also, as there was little prospect for the business to recover, it was required to be put under review if it should continue.
Also, as there was little prospect for the business to recover, it was required to be put under review if it should continue.

sen.j: 京都府は田中敦仁関西学院大学教授を中心とする検討委員会を設置した。
sen.e: Kyoto Prefecture set up a reviewing committee with Kwansei Gakuin University Professor, Atsuhito TANAKA as a head.
Kyoto Prefecture set up a reviewing committee with Kwansei Gakuin University Professor, Atsuhito TANAKA as a head.
Kyoto Prefecture set up a reviewing committee with Kansei Gakuin University Professor, Atsuhito TANAKA as a head.

sen.j: 初会合では存続に否定的な意見が大半を占め、サッカー場などへの転用を期待する声も上がっていると報告されている。
sen.e: The report says that in the first meeting, the vast majority of opinions regarding its continuation were negative and that there were some who wished to turn it into a soccer field.
The report says that in the first meeting, the vast majority of opinions regarding its continuation were negative and that there were some who wished to turn it into a soccer field.
The report says that in the first meeting, the vast majority of opinions regarding its continuation were negative and that there were some who wished to turn it into a soccer field.

sen.j: バンク
sen.e: Racing Track
Racing Track
Racing Track

sen.j: 400mを使用している。
sen.e: The track used here is 400 meters in circumference.
The track used here is 400 meters in circumference.
The track used here is 400 meters in circumference.

sen.j: やや直線が短めにできており、奈良競輪場程ではないものの、すり鉢状のバンクである。
sen.e: As its straightaways are rather short, this track is mortar-shaped, but not so much as Nara Keirin Velodrome.
As its straightaways are rather short, this track is mortar-shaped, but not as much as the Nara Keirin Velodrome.
As its straightaways are rather short, this track is mortar-shaped, but not as much as the Nara Keirin Velodrome.

sen.j: そのため僅かながら捲り選手が有利で、三番手の選手が不利な展開が多い。
sen.e: Because of this, forereachers have a slight advantage in this track whereas the third cyclist in the line often has unfavorable developments in the race.
Because of this, forereachers have a slight advantage in this track whereas the third cyclist in the line often faces unfavorable developments during the race.
Because of this, forereachers have a slight advantage in this track whereas the third cyclist in the line often faces unfavorable developments during the race.

sen.j: アクセス
sen.e: Access
Access
Access

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道東海道本線向日町駅・阪急電鉄阪急京都本線東向日駅下車。
sen.e: Get off the train at Mukomachi Station on the West Japan Railway Tokaido Main Line, or at Higashimuko Station on the Hankyu Corporation Hankyu Kyoto Main Line.
Get off the train at Mukomachi Station on the Westside of the Japan Railway Tokaido Main Line, or at Higashimuko Station on the Hankyu Corporation Hankyu Kyoto Main Line.
Get off the train at Mukomachi Station on Tokaido Main Line, JR West, or at Higashimuko Station on Hankyu Kyoto Main Line, Hankyu Railway.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: それぞれから無料送迎バスで約8分。
sen.e: From each station, it takes about eight minutes by free shuttle bus.
From each station, it takes about eight minutes by free shuttle bus.
From each station, it takes about eight minutes by free shuttle bus.

sen.j: 「ホルモンうどん」という、うどんかけうどん・素うどんにもつを乗せた食べ物があちこちの食堂で販売されているが、別冊宝島270「競輪マクリ読本」誌上にて、競輪場ナンバーワングルメに選出された。
sen.e: Giblets udon noodles,' in which Japanese wheat noodles in broth are topped with cooked giblets, are sold at many restaurants inside the velodrome, and it is the dish that was chosen as the best gourmet food at velodromes in a magazine called "Bessatsu Takarajima 270 'Keirin Makuri Dokuhon (All about keirin)'."

Giblets udon noodles,' in which Japanese wheat noodles in broth are topped with cooked giblets, are sold at many restaurants inside the velodrome, and this is the dish chosen as the best gourmet food at velodromes in a magazine called "Bessatsu Takarajima 270 'Keirin Makuri Dokuhon (All about keirin)'."

Giblets udon noodles,' in which Japanese wheat noodles in broth are topped with cooked giblets, are sold at many restaurants inside the velodrome, and this is the dish chosen as the best gourmet food at velodromes in a magazine called Bessatsu Takarajima 270 'Keirin Makuri Dokuhon' (All about keirin).
sen.cmt: クォーテーションの位置などを変えました。

sen.j: なお、店によっては昆布付のところもある。
sen.e: Some restaurants serve the dish with konbu (a kind of kelp used for Japanese soup stock).
Some restaurants serve the dish with konbu (a kind of kelp used for Japanese soup stock).
Some restaurants serve the dish with konbu (a kind of kelp used for Japanese soup stock).

sen.j: また、大津びわこ競輪場にあるいくつかの食堂でも賞味できる。
sen.e: Also, it can be found at some restaurants at Otsu Biwako Keirin Velodrome.
Also, it can be found at some restaurants at Otsu Biwako Keirin Velodrome.
Also, it can be found at some restaurants at Otsu Biwako Keirin Velodrome.

sen.e: A chronological list of the memorial keirin winners after April, 2002 when the current system of 4 days in one term started.
